original_text: And joy and gladness is taken from the plentiful field, and from the land of Moab, and I have caused wine to fail from the winepresses: none shall tread with shouting; their shouting shall be no shouting.
korean_text: 기쁨과 환희가 옥토와 모압 땅에서 빼앗겼도다 내가 포도주 틀에 포도주가 끊어지게 하리니 외치며 밟는 자가 없을 것이라 그 외침은 즐거운 외침이 되지 못하리로다

sentences.original_text: And joy and gladness is taken from the plentiful field
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기쁨과 즐거움이 풍성한 들에서 사라졌다

sentences.original_text: and from the land of Moab
and I have caused wine to fail from the winepresses
their shouting shall be no shouting
